MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Haulfryn, Pant Isa and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.55am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.10pm on 28th April 2021.
